home.heroTitle: Discover Your Potential and Grow Your Career
home.heroSubtitle: The AI platform that helps you understand your personality, identify your strengths, and build your ideal career path through advanced psychological assessments.
home.featuresSubtitle: AI-powered tools to accelerate your career.

features.psychologicalEvaluationsDesc: Understand your personality and cognitive skills.
features.personalizedCareerPlansDesc: Get a clear roadmap based on your unique profile.
features.advancedAnalyticsDesc: Track your progress with detailed insights.
features.aiMentoringDesc: Receive continuous guidance from your AI mentor.

dashboard.welcomeSubtext: Start your personal and professional development journey with our AI tests.

actions.startFirstTest: Take the first step towards self-discovery
actions.startFirstTestDesc: Complete a test to receive personalized recommendations.
actions.planCareerDesc: Set your goals and track your progress step by step.

careerPaths.title: Your Personalized Career Plans
careerPaths.subtitle: AI creates career plans based on your test results, giving you a clear path to your professional goals.

dashboard.title: Career Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Monitor your progress and plan your next steps.

cvOptimization.title: CV Optimization
cvOptimization.description: Analyze your CV against a job description to improve your chances. Get detailed feedback and optimization suggestions.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.welcomeMessage: Here you can see a summary of your activity and personal information.

admin.notice: This is an administrator account with access to all features.
